page.title: 01BISHOPBRIGGS
page.content: {Bishopbriggs}is a dormitory suburb of Glasgow, approximately 6 km. from the city centre on the North side of the city. It has grown considerably to its present population of between 25,000 and 30,000 within the last 20 years. There are few employment opportunities within the settlement and many people travel into Glasgow to find work. It lies within a convenient location having the facilities of a large city on its doorstep, but is within easy reach of the countryside especially the Campsie Fells which lie only a few km. away to the north.
